krpano.data:
Tuscany

A krpano tech-demo for:
  • OBJ/MTL with Multiple Textures
  • Collision Detection (Walking, Stairs)
  • Real Physical Heights in VR
  • Various 3D Navigation Methods
Keyboard Controls:
  • Arrows or WASD - Moving
  • SHIFT - Moving faster
  • Q or SPACE - Jumping
  • Y or Z - Crouching
  • C - toggle Collision On / Off
  • F - toggle Walking / Flying
Credits:
The 3D-Model and the textures are from
the Oculus VR SDK 'Oculus World Demo'.
Click/Touch to start
